basics.name: Madeline Dexter
basics.label: Data Developer
basics.summary: Madeline is a data developer with experience in database management, ETL development, data warehousing, cloud infrastructure, business analytics, and peer mentorship. She has architected data flow patterns for a range of companies with products like Snowflake, Redshift, RDS, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker and Jenkins. Madeline works in languages like Python, Java, and various SQL and shell scripting dialects.

work.name: Vivid Seats
highlights: Wrote, deployed and managed microservices to enable co-dependent RDS and Snowflake migrations
Deployed and managed database architecture to company-wide adoption of microservices
Upgraded OLTP and OLAP MySQL RDS instances with minimal downstream impact to production systems
Developed a user identity, role, and warehouse allotment management system for Snowflake
Developed a task execution model for extraction of OLTP data into cached Snowflake views
